# Government Tender Announcement - Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) - Solicitation Number: T8080-230338

## The following notice relates to a proposed procurement for a Specific requirement: Solutions-Based Professional Services (TSPS).

Transports Canada (TC) publishes this notice to inform potential suppliers that a requirement for professional services is currently open for tender.

## Background Information:
The Transport of Dangerous Goods (TDG) Directorate at Transports Canada is responsible for promoting public safety during the transportation of hazardous substances. This project aims to identify human factors involved in TDG training to reduce errors leading to non-compliance.

## Required Services:
The successful vendor will be expected to deliver a literature review and analysis to identify human factors and perform a human error analysis to determine the best practices for training and assessment in the areas of human performance and learning.

## Requirements:
    - The vendor will conduct a comprehensive literature review and analysis of human error related to TDG training.
    - Conduct a human error analysis of the subtasks listed in the CGSB 192.3 standard.
    - Analyze recent data on non-compliance with TDG regulations to identify current recurring issues.

## Eligibility:
    - Only TSPS SA Holders under (TSPS SA E60ZT-16TSSB) are eligible to tender.
    - Potential bidders must demonstrate expertise in Business consulting and change management services.
